discussiontools-replywidget-terms-click: "$1" hagaa caddiyoogan, ha wiikkiiyaa go'ettiyoo maachatun maayettadasa.
discussiontools-error-comment-is-transcl: "{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" ha gattiyaagee ha qofaassi zaaruwaa immannawu go'ana danddayenna. Zaaranaassi "$1" haga caddada hayyanaa kumetta sinttaa harumissiyaagaa go'etta.
"{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" ha gattiyaagee ha qofaassi zaaruwaa immannawu go'ana danddayenna, gaasoykka i hara sinttaappe yiis. Zaaranaassi hayyanaa hagaakko ba:[[$1]].
discussiontools-error-lint: Wiikiixuufiyaan balay de'iyo gaasuwan ha sinttan de'iya qofata zaarana danddayettenna. Ha balatubaa ha [$1 issippe uttida fayileta nabbabiyoogan], luxanaassi, maaduwaassi oychiyoogan, [$2 hagan gatti oyttiyoogan] woykko hagan [$3 kumetta sinttaa harumissiyaagaa dooyiyoogan] balaa pagalana danddayaasa.
tag-discussiontools-edit-description: Go'ettiyaagee DiscussionTools kase de'iya qofaa harummis
tag-discussiontools-newtopic-description: DiscussionTools de'iya sintran go'ettiyaagee ooratta huuphe yohuwaa gujjiis.
